name: Ghostblasters: You Know Who to Call
name_original: Ghostblasters: You Know Who to Call
description:
Created by don boody music by Tim Crowe

A short Ghostbusters fan game created for #SatMornJam.

I do not own Ghostbusters. Ghostbusters is not my property.

  • MOVE with A or D
  • JUMP with J, DOUBLE JUMP with JJ
  • SHOOT with K
  • SHOOT UP with K+W

If blastin' makes you feel good, please share this game with some pals.
